InfoAuthorizationRequest.name: InfoAuthorizationRequest
InfoAuthorizationRequest.description: Tracks a request for authorization on a Data Use Purpose. For example, consent request to share the documents required to open a financial account and share loan rate lock disclosure to the external customer.

CommunicationType.description: The medium of which this request was sent.

ConsenterId.description: The external (communities) account who is consenting to this request.

DataUsePurposeId.description: Reference to the purpose of this request.

ExpirationDateTime.description: The expiration date of this request.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Locale.description: The locale of the request (used to find Auth Form Texts that match the locale).

MultipartyInfoAuthRequestId.description: ID of the related multiparty info authorization request record.

Name.description: Name of the info authorization request record.

OwnerId.description: ID of the user who created the relationship record.

PertainsToId.description: The person to whom this request pertains.

RequestedDateTime.description: The date time that this request was sent.

RequesterId.description: The party that initiated the request.

ResponseStatus.description: The consentee's response to this request.

SourceRecordId.description: The record from which this consent request is created.
